sourcesContent:
const internshipsInfo = [
    {
        key: 1,
        internRole: "Data Analytics Intern (Digital Marketing & E-Commerce)",
        company: "Marina Bay Sands | Las Vegas Sands Corporation",
        date: "July 2022 - December 2022",
        description: ["Automated report generation process using Python to track business performance.",
                    "Assisted in ongoing data analysis to identify opportunities for driving business success.",
                    "Analysed audience performance data throughout the customer journey across the marketing tech stack (Customer Data Platform) to optimise customer journey.",
                    "Collaborated with the different marketing teams to optimise conversion rates and KPIs through data analysis across channels such as media, website and mobile."],
        url: "https://www.marinabaysands.com"
    },

    {
        key: 2,
        internRole: "Data Science Intern",
        company: "RSM Singapore",
        date: "December 2021 - May 2022",
        description: ["Proficiently deploy tools and techniques for automating data analytical procedures such as data extraction and reconciliation.",
                    "Translate business problems to quantitative problems, analyzing them to derive data-driven insights and actionable recommendations.",
                    "Apply visualization and object-oriented programming techniques to data science problems."],
        url: "https://www.rsm.global/singapore/service/data-science"
    },

    {
        key: 3,
        internRole: "Junior Analyst Member",
        company: "NUS Business Analytics Consulting Team",
        date: "August 2021 - April 2022",
        description: ["Learnt techniques on machine learning, data visualisation and web automation.", 
                    "Partnered with Pan-Malayan to build dashboards for their analytical purposes."],
        url: "https://www.linkedin.com/company/nusbact/"
    },

    {
        key: 4,
        internRole: "Data Analytics Intern",
        company: "Stone Forest Singapore",
        date: "May 2021 - August 2021",
        description: ["Learnt the basics of KNIME, PowerBI and Spotlight Reporting.",
                    "Took on the main role of evaluating the functionality of Spotlight Reporting and how much it can value-add to the reports for clients."],
        url: "https://www.stoneforest.com.sg/"
    },

    {
        key: 5,
        internRole: "Digital Marketing and Retail Operations Intern",
        company: "Weekend Sundries",
        date: "February 2019 - April 2019",
        description: ["Involved in the ideation and execution of marketing campaigns.",
                    "Created Social Media content for the brand.",
                    "Assisted in retail operations."],
        url: "https://weekendsundries.com/"
    }
]

export default internshipsInfo;
